**Excerpt from site:** The AmericasBarometer data sets feature a common core set of questions that has been asked from 2004 to present day. In addition, LAPOP has datasets that date back to the 1970s. Questionnaires and information on each data set can be found [here](http://www.vanderbilt.edu/lapop/core-surveys.php).

1.  Link to datasets here: <https://www.vanderbilt.edu/lapop/data-access.php>
